questions.question: Functional requirements of a system are related to

answers.a: Using the system (by users) to get some meaningful work done
answers.b: How the system functions under different constraints
answers.c: Whether they adhere to the organization policies

questions.question: The main objective behind preparing a SRS is to

answers.a: Let client and developers agree that they understand each other
answers.d: To judge whether the project could be undertaken
